description: Lead and provide software deployment, troubleshooting, upgrade and migration support to sites worldwide.
Provide analytical support for operator workload study benchmarking and stewardship.
Design, implement and lead multiple enhancements and tool-making projects.
Modernize work process through introduction of version control, automation, and work process standardization.
Provide data analytic and business intelligence tools and ad-hoc services, to drive business decisions and improve efficiency
Train remote/on-site personnel and provide mentoring to new employees.
